description:
Thunar is an EXCELLENT file manager and where it realy shines is for batch renaming. If you ever want to alter multiple files at once (for example with search and replace or to add or subtracting text from the begining or end of the file names.

Even if you are happy with Dolphin or Nautilus most of the time - Thunar is a MUST !
finally backspace option available using this file manager
need this till Nautilus gets fixed

Pros
- Very fast. The first thing that is immediately apparent is how snappy Thunar is compared to Nautilus. Everything from launching the application to navigating folder is just faster and hence better. This fact alone makes it a much better alternative to Gnome. Which makes me wonder what Nautilus does in the eon it takes from clicking the application button to the window appearing. Got to hand it to Gnome devs - They seem to be exceptionally adept at making software more bloated while constantly removing features. 
- Has Split-view and tab support
- None of Gnome's 'type to trigger search' idiocy
- Lightweight enough to sit along side Nautilus on Ubuntu.
Cons
- No recursive folder search. In a file manager. Seriously? Guess XFCE guy don't want Gnome take all the credit. There is something called 'Custom action' via which you can try to add this function but it is way too much hassle for something that should be there in the first place.
- UI could be better. Miss 'Folder View', 'New folder' buttons of Nautilus.
- Also 'Recent files' in Sidepane.
summary: Better than Nautilus, But no recursive folder search. Seriously?

description: top. It does what it should

I use Xubuntu xfce desktop and Thunar worked very nicely for me, until the latest update. it seems to have dropped the "SORT" function and now my files are in random lists. A pity. I uninstalled Thunar and installed PCMan File manager.
summary: Latest update December 29, 2019 seems to be missing "SORT" function

description: Does the job, swiftly and without any hassles. Keep up the good job!
file manager good Love it *****
It's the best.
summary: I love it, it has everything it need

description: Time not updating for the files in the folder. Very frustrating !!!
summary: Time not updating for the files

description: missing search function. not easy to select files of one or two types. It works quickly, but it needs to add things or make a few extensions/add-ons as an option to be added on.

Thunar is the best file manager. You
can also enter terminal at the location you choose. I have been using it for years and it has not let me down. 20.04
I need to move and copy files for engineering and nautilus can't hack it. Either Thunar or trying to remember to the command line for moving files.
summary: Finally a file manager that works in Linux

description:
I recommend this file browser and manager. Fast, and it generates thumbnails much much quicker on image files than Nautilus. Good rename facility.
Recommend
Dolphin doesnt allow you to run as root (easily) and as such thunar is much easier
fast but unfortunately no split view
summary: fast but unfortunately no split view

description: There seems to be a bug involving left-clicking failing to register after a right-click in an open space
Includes directory tree mode, which can be powerful for copying and moving files with the mouse.
Nutze XFCE schon immer und damit Thunar, bin mit diesem Dateimanager sehr zufrieden:
speziell seit Nautilus die Dateipfade beim Kopieren nicht mehr "skript"-fähig ausgibt.
Minimalistisch und effizient
Si bien no tiene la potencia de otros gestores, su velocidad, rendimiento y sencillez es incomparable. Recomendado al usuario promedio.

Si puede mostrar todos los archivos de una unidad o de una carpeta, funciona a la perfección. Si hay al menos un archivo que no pueda leer, no permite ver ninguno. A cambio muestra un mensaje de error, incluso si el dispositivo se ha montado correctamente
Mucho mejor que Nautilus
summary: Mucho mejor que el que viene por defecto en Ubutu

description: La probé por la posibilidad simple de crear carpetas.
summary: En Debian 10 Buster se cuelga con reiteración

description: Très simple et intuitif pour renommer massivement des fichiers, avec toutes les fonctionnalités couramment nécessaires.

Не удается запустить исполняемый файл - только открыть в каком нибудь приложении
- неработоспособно
Слишком высокая чувствительность при работе c "мышью", ложные срабатывания, настройке не поддается. Пришлось устанавливать PCManFM, где таких лагов нет
用這個軟體開PDF的時候會卡著，但用別的開PDF就不會，覺得可能是這個檔案管理員的問題
summary: 覺得畫面最好看的檔案管理軟體
